text:
Hey guys, My name is Roy Bass from CA, United States.
I have gained 9+ years of rich experience in many companies as a Senior Software Engineer / Lead Front-end Engineer.
I specialize in React/Redux, Vue.js front-end development and Node.js, Laravel, Ruby on Rails back-end development.
I am passionate about writing clean, bug free, maintainable, well-structured code taking into consideration the best coding practices.
As a Senior Software Engineer experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects, I am sure I could be an immediate, valuable asset for the success of your project, your team and your business.
I am full-time available now and I can get started on new project immediately, I can commit 40+ hours per week.

Would you let me know if there is a job opportunity for me in your company?
